headline: Healthcare Digital Experience Platform Market Analysis Report 2025 | Cloud-Based Solutions Lead the Way with 63.7% Share - Global Forecast to 2034
summary: The Global Healthcare Digital Experience Platform Market, valued at USD 1.1 billion in 2024, is expected to grow at a CAGR of 13.5% to reach USD 3.9 billion by 2034. This expansion is driven by an industry shift towards digital-first strategies and patient-centric care, emphasizing seamless, integrated experiences.
